General.Name: Hillcon
General.Description: PT Hillcon Tbk provides mining and civil construction services in Indonesia. The company operates as a nickel and coal mining contractor. It also provides mine planning, land clearing for mining areas, construction of mining area infrastructure, and overburden removal services; and earthwork, road, water shed, and weir construction services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Hillcon Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hillcon Equity Management.
